title: (4920) Campos - 8 Avenida 1 de Janeiro
description: Parking at the football stadium. Almost no traffic.

title: (36730) Tomino - 25 Lugar O Ramo
description: Very quiet place, on the bank of the river. There is a cobblestone base to park 3 motorhomes and a ramp to lower boats to the river. It also has a bar-restaurant 500 m away where you can eat very well.

title: (36740) A Pedra -
description: Very calm. Ample parking. Tables and benches. River path. Bathing area

title: (4920) Vila Meã - Unnamed Road
description: Gas bottle exchange (Falcão Gomez Gás): We exchanged our Campingaz 904 bottle here. They also have other models from Campingaz :)

title: (36740) Tomiño - 8 Camiño do Alivio
description: Parking at center of Tomiño with shade (with limit of height) and without shade (without limit). Plain and with all services by side.

title: (36740) Tomiño - 17 Rúa Gondomar
description: Self-service launderette, very friendly operators!

title: (4920-140) Alto das Cerejas - 5 Rua da Tomada
title_short: (4920-140) Alto das Cerejas - 5 Rua da Tomada
description: Motorhome area, just behind the restaurant Braseria do Minho, paved, open in 2016, a lot of space

name: Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
title: (4920) Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
description: Lovelhe river beach. Nice place to spend the day, picnic and swim. There is a bathroom and cold showers. The Center of Vilanova de Cerveira is 2 minutes away.

title: (36791) - Unnamed Road
description: Port of Rio Miñio fishermen, equipped with picnic table, barbecue, water point. Beware of floods, it is better to stay a little higher. Night without worry, very calm. No service.

title: (4920) Gavea - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park overlooking the valley. Bigger than the viewpoint with the swing. We went up there with our 7m30 cc without any worries. In this month of January, the place is deserted. A flat part can allow you to land for the night.

title: (4920) Lovelhe - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
title_short: (4920) Lovelhe - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
description: Seen 180 degrees on the river border between Portugal and Spain. Small parking without convenience ... Road not wide to access that climbs a lot ... What a view!

title: (4920) Lovelhe - 17 Avenida do Tomiño
description:
Parking between the soccer field and the cemetery
level without services or restrictions for motorhomes and campers three hundred meters from the center

title: (4920) - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
description: Quiet location overlooking the Hispano-Portuguese border. Water point, picnic tables, barbecue available. No service. Possibility to sleep there one night.

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 4920 Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 4920 Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
description: Small car park next to the vaccination center, in a dead end under the olive trees. Small fountain to cool off. Quiet place to stop for lunch or even spend the night because it is also suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Rua do Espírito Santo
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Rua do Espírito Santo
description: Magnificent view on the heights 2 km from the village. Calm.

title: (4920-279) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 12 Rua Dom Manuel I
title_short: (4920-279) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 12 Rua Dom Manuel I
description: Laundromat

title: (4920-275) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 10 Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
title_short: (4920-275) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 10 Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
description: A large car P in the middle of the interesting small city, flat, illuminated and aside Minho river, without limitations or prohibitions. NOTE: week open market each Saturday morning, so do not park Friday night till Saturday after lunchtime. Perfect for visiting the city. It has public bathrooms. Train line aside but N 13 main road is a little away.

title: (36791) Pontevedra - 22A Lugar O Monte
description: Public fountain to catch water. It parks well next to it.

title: (36750) Goián - 41A Lugar O Couto
description: Good location good view of Portugal at the Miño river bank.

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Avenida dos Pescadores
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Avenida dos Pescadores
description: Area for campers near the town. Restaurants, bar, bakeries and of petiscos (Portuguese tapas).

title: (36750) - 8 Avenida Pío Troncoso
description:
8 places conditioned by the Tomiño town hall. Close to supermarkets and an area of
 playtime.

title: (36750) Galicia - 42 Avenida Ordóñez
description: Self-service laundry

title: (4920) Loivo - Unnamed road
description: Cozy place with shade and a good restaurant next door to eat typical food from the country.

title: (4920) - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place on the mountain surrounded by nothing but nature. Beautiful view. Very quiet and secluded. Not suitable for large motorhomes. 4x4 an advantage, but we got along well with our 2wd T4.

title: (4920) Candemil - N303
description: Picnic spot on side of road. Could sleep the night. Water and bins available.

title: (4920) - Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho
title_short: (4920)  - Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho
description: Small car park on a dock in the middle of the ecovia, just 2 km from Vila Nova da Cerveira and next to the river Miño. Capacity for 3 motorhomes and a monastic tranquility. Cool

address.street: Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho

title: (4930) - Ecopista
description: Large car park right next to the river and where you can start a cycle path by the ecopist. We stayed here one night and it happened to be a very quiet location as there was no traffic. There are trash cans near the park and recreation area. Clean toilets, there is a water point available, a bar, picnic tables, games for children, barbecues etc...

title: (4920) Gondarém - 7 Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho
title_short: (4920) Gondarém - 7 Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho
description: Tables and barbecues

address.street: 7 Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho

title: (4920) - Unnamed Road
description: Natural pitch on top of the hill, ocean views and absolute peace, an excellent place to spend time in complete solitude

title: (4930) Cristêlo Côvo - IP1
description: Ample ground parking, next to the Wednesday market. Flat. Without services.

title: (36711) Tui - 5 Lugar Gayos
description: Bargaoil gas station, lovely Vanessa lets us throw gray ones in the black car washes in the toilets, leaving them clean as they were and get clean water, she also lets us sleep at the gas station

title: (36711) Tui - 7 Estrada de Anta
description: CC service area adjacent to the discount service station.

title: (4930) Valença - EM1046
description: Perfect place to leave your RV while visiting the fortress of Valença do Minho (12 Century). If one wishes to stay overnight... no problem at all, local Police station is in front and usualy they don’t implícate with us.

title: (36760) El Rosal - Camiño do Río
description: Very extensive place for all types of vehicles, with beach, promenade, abundant shadows, restaurants and tranquility

title: (36779) Bonaval - Unnamed Road
description: Area in the middle of nature very very quiet with tables and benches, a river with multiple waterfalls, we have spent the night in AC and the only noise was that of the water falling through the waterfalls

title: (4920) Sapardos - 801 N303
description: Just a break by the side of the road. Wide ground which allows to stop for lunch with a beautiful view.

title: (4930-678) Valença - 9 Avenida Miguel Dantas
description: Park for those traveling with a quiet night, plenty of space to visit Valença, go shopping and eat a good cod. No service for children.

title: (4920) - N303
description: Nice place for a stopover. More beautiful and peaceful than the noisy stops on the road. Barbecue grills and many tables to eat. The parking space offers only a few flat spots. Really great plus just one minute from the highway.

title: (4930-678) Valença - 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (4930-678) Valença - 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Near fortress Valença

address.street: 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (4930) Valença - 6 Avenida de Espanha
description: Ground parking.

title: (4930-596) Valença - 13 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Stationary on very quiet place and near the fortress

title: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Although next to the walls of Valencia there is a lot of parking for tourists, this one has the advantage of not being dirt but cobblestone, very used by buses. quiet and very close to the Puerta do Sol, has no services.

address.street: Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (4930-674) Valença - 18 Avenida Doutor Tito Fontes
description: Lidl park. 1 minute from the city center.

title: (4930) Valença - 982 Avenida Pinto da Mota
description:
Parking de tierra bastante plano,sin limitación de altura y fácilmente maniobrable para vehículos grandes cercano a la fortaleza.
lugar muy tranquilo donde pasar la noche cercano al casco urbano

title: (36713) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Flat area with good views, only accessible by dirt road

title: (4930-655) Valença - 25 Rua dos Seixos
description: Quiet and pleasant place with playground and leisure park. Close to the historic area and the Minho bike path.

title: (36700) Tui - 15 Rúa Barca
description:
Several areas with parking and views of the river Miño.
Good place to spend the day with the family, children's area, walks along the river.
Very quiet to sleep.

title: (4910) Lanhelas - 110 Estrada do Rio
description: Picnic in area Minho flumen.

name: Área de autocaravanas Tui
title: (36700) Área de autocaravanas Tui
description: Motorhome parking for a maximum of 3 vehicles. Water available on site, disposal possible via a hole in the ground. It is approx. 500 meters to the village. It is a place of pilgrimage with corresponding prices, but worth seeing. Access maximum 3.5 tons.

title: (36760) O Rosal - Unnamed Road
description: Small hold of descent of boats, in my opinion of premises. Peaceful place, without water or service. Facing the Portuguese coast that are noisy with the train line but no more. Not recommended for large vehicles, access by narrow roads. No height limit.

title: (36760) O Río -
description: At the end of the path is a turning hammer, there is a small space under trees. There are stone benches and tables. Right on the water. 1-2 street lanterns nearby. We spent a quiet night and a nice day here. Of course no service

title: (36700) Tui - 4 Rúa Ourense
description: Free parking, quiet and many places

title: (4910-204) Lanhelas - 1270 N13
description: Inexpensive GASOLAR gas station with GPL - Attention! Only cash payment possible. ATM directly at the gas station. Adblue can also be tanked.

title: (4910-201) Lanhelas - 281 Rua Ilídio Couto
description: A great view of the river a very nice place to stay for a night, there are potable water points and picnic tables. Don't fire and clean the deposit dirt water no service is available.

title: (36700) Tui - 34 Rúa O Pilar
description: LAUNDRY

title: (36713) O Guindal -
description: Just off the road going to Tui from Baiona. Behind a mound. A pleasant walk into the forest. No services only 2 bars of 4g. Room for 2 motor homes.

title: (36700) Tuy - 2A Prolongación Alcalde Casal Aboy
description: Solar used as parking, also close to the health center, there are two others closer, this seemed the quietest / safest and suitable for our trailer .

title: (36770) O Rosal - Camiño As Covas
description: Small parking lot to start a beautiful route through some mills next to the river. WC and fountain. You can spend the night. Very calm

title: (4930) Valença - EM1055
description: Area in the middle of nature with a route to a waterfall

title: (36700) Tuy - 1 O Rollo
description: Esplanade and wide and free streets. Useful when the municipal parking lot is too full to maneuver.

title: (36700) Tui - 22A Rúa Canónigo Valiño
description: Very quiet free parking 800 meters from tui cathedral, without services

name: Camping Covas Park
title: () Camping Covas Park
description: Muito bom, um típico parque de campismo bem cuidado. O pessoal foi extremamente simpático 5 estrelas.

title: (36770) O Rosal - 8D Avenida Ramon Franco
description: Parking close to all services, a little inclined. You can spend the night

title: (36770) O Rosal - 15 A Cumieira Abaixo
description: Picnic area easily accessible to all sizes. Calm and pleasant near a river. Not tested at night, no parking ban

title: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 661 EM1035
description:
Tap with fresh water, next to the church.
opposite is a beautiful and charming abandoned villa.
the path to the source (5 MT) is narrow, just a T3/T4 fits

title: (36389) Gondomar - PO-340
description: Quiet viewpoint with good views. There is a fountain, tables to eat and garbage. We are not sure if you can sleep there but they have never told us anything (we have slept several times). There are horses sometimes. Usually no one is there at night. It is easy not to see it, so it is better to be careful and slow.

title: (4930) Monte do Faro - 6 N101-1
description: Site next to picnic area. There is a fountain near the lookout. We didn't stay overnight, we just parked to see the views. It seems calm.

title: (4940-259) Paredes de Coura - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic area located on a very quiet street. Here, at most, the residents pass by, most of them greeting friendly. Fountain, barbecue and benches available. Very nicely located under trees. We stayed one night.

title: (36794) Oia - Unnamed Road
description: Superb place very large with picnic tables, a spring, barbecues, wild horses and room for everyone. At the end of a small path in fairly good condition. Absolute calm. Clean place. In short, perfect.

title: (36760) O Rosal - 12 Lugar Ponte Da Tamuxe
title_short: (36760) O Rosal - 12 Lugar Ponte Da Tamuxe
description: Picnic area among eucalyptus trees with lots of shade. Wood tables. Nice view of the river and there is a Roman bridge. We have not slept but it looks like we can sleep peacefully.

title: (4910) - 160 Caminho do Cabo
description: Quiet and beautiful site, where there is a river where you can swim and a small waterfall with several wheels of mills. There is a small bar next door, easy to get to. Ideal to spend the day, I do not know if you can spend the night

title: (4910-347) Seixas - 39 Rua da Boalheira
description: Small, flat car park along a train line with a view of the river. Space for 4 not too big Motorhomes. Departure of walks. Very beautiful view

title: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - Caminho da Chousa
title_short: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - Caminho da Chousa
description: Beautiful and relaxing place surrounded by nature

title: (36712) Tui - A-55
description: Playground and picnic areas next to the parking area. On the outskirts of Tui. Water fountain. There is a taperia right in front. Ideal to go with children.

title: (36760) El Rosal - 36760 Pías
description: About ten possible locations almost flat on the edge of children's play areas, tennis, ... places in the shade and a pretty wooded park. Garbage cans available. Thank you to the municipality for tolerating us

title: (4940-132) Rubiães - Unnamed Road
description: Nice garden with parking spaces in a small village. we spent the night in a Van, it was perfect. Very quiet and with a nice view. Not many houses and most of them abandoned.

title: (36760) O Rosal - 13 Camiño do Cotro
description: Parking at the mouth of the Tamuxe river with swings, football field, beach bar, tables. There is a small path to walk to the watermills. Quiet area to spend the night.

title: (36720) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Earthen parking at the edge of the river. Some places overlooking the river. Trees to have shade.

title: (4920) Covas - Zona de Lazer de Covas
title_short: (4920) Covas - Zona de Lazer de Covas
description:
Pic nic area with parking, in the nature. Super beautiful and calm!
There are picnic tables and benches, a barbecue area, with sink. The toilets were closed, but the building seems quite new.
It's right at the Coura river where you can go for a shallow swim, super idilic.
Beware of the access, because the path is a bit steep and bumpy, and right at the curve. We have a 6m motorhome, and it worked for us.

title: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - 121 Estrada da Ponte
title_short: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - 121 Estrada da Ponte
description: Nice place next to a bridge to spend the night.

title: (36712) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Monte Aloya, there is a bar there are WCs, there is no motorhome service.

title: (36712) Tui - 159 PO-3001
description: Nice little place in peace, just next door you can take the path that goes down for 100m and you are right at the edge of the stream.

title: (36760) A Gándara -
description: There is a picnic table and an esplanade where several vans fit. There is a big tree that provides shade for a van. Quiet site, a dirt road passes nearby but with almost no traffic.

title: (36770) Pancenteo - 22 PO-353
description: Small tap with drinking water. Good parking directly in front. Only suitable for filling canisters.

title: (4910) Seixas - 6 Avenida da Marginal
description:
Illuminated and very quiet parking beside the river Miño. Highly recommended to spend the night without problems.
Right next to Seixas at less than 100 mt.

name: Aneli Sertuy
title: (36720) Aneli Sertuy
description: Gas station with free shower. Very nice staff. We took a shower and filled up the fuel afterwards (also cheap)

title: (4940-604) Porreiras - Unnamed Road
description: Very spacious site with plenty of parking space. It is on top of a hill with spectacular views and tables to eat in the shade.

title: (36794) Oia - Unnamed Road
description: Viewpoint at side of road. Level enough for small camper. Short drive to shops cafe. On walking route. Wild ponies in the morning!

title: (4930) - Unnamed Road
description: St Ovidio viewpoint

title: () Oia - Unnamed Road
description: Miradoro Das Pinezas.  Next to a paragliding launch.  We drove our 7 meter campingcar up the road but I put 4x4 since most wont want to drive it.  saw only one car from 2pm till morning.  Got pretty windy during the night, but it is a stunning site.

title: (4940) Formariz -
description: Flat space on the side of an unpaved road, used only by hikers. In the middle of the woods. The dirt road can be traveled by any means, but it is necessary to pass through the town to reach it, the asphalted road is very steep, not suitable for large vehicles.

title: (4940) Formariz - Rua do Burgo
description: Ample parking on grass, partly shaded, no services, there is a fountain nearby, across the street.

title: (4910) Arga de Baixo -
description: Large parking lot with picnic tables. It is next to a road but not very busy. It is the parking lot to access the climbing sector. There are no services, no garbage can, so it is our responsibility to take our garbage :)

title: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
title_short: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
description: Picnic area with toilets and drinking water. Next to the ecopista and river miño.

title: (36414) Os Cabreiros -
description: Spot in front of a big stone, which blockes the road to the quarry. Good view and nice area to hike. You can also explore the quarry. A lot of animal poo in this area and wild horses in the forests around you.

title: (36780) A Guarda - 33 Rúa San Roque
description: Gas station, and one of the few, if not the only one, that has ICE in this summer of 2022. To take into account.

title: (36794) Oia - 23 Lugar a Riña
description: Small car park just below the monastery of Santa María de Oia. Without any service. It is attached to a small beach and pier in the town. Nearby there are bars and restaurants with terraces with incredible views.

title: (36794) Oia - 27 Lugar O Arrabal
description: An old well with drinking water. Great for replenishing your water supplies.

title: (36414) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Old quarry with room for several vans. Access by dirt track. Perfect for visiting Monte Aloia Without services.

title: (36794) Oia - 29 Lugar O Arrabal
description: Breathtaking view of the ocean, just the sound of the waves. Very windy. Small path to get there, steep, more for Van.

title: (36789) La Guardia - 90 Rua Desembocadura do Miño
title_short: (36789) La Guardia - 90 Rua Desembocadura do Miño
description: Small car park next to the river from which you can see Portugal. Routes can be made from there. We spent one night and there was no one else so we left, the second night there was another motorhome and we stayed. It is a place surrounded by nature, very quiet, but very lonely if there is no one else. The good thing is that it is very well leveled and is beautiful at night. The downside is that you get there by a dirt road that is a bit uncomfortable because of the potholes.

name: Playa Camping Santa Tecla
title: (36789) Playa Camping Santa Tecla
description: We are a 1st Category Camping located in the Miño River estuary a few meters from its mouth. We have more than 500 camping pitches, bungalows and rooms. Possibility of spending the night in our campsite with a 40% discount. Among the services: swimming pool, supermarket, restaurant, mini golf, recreation area, emptying chemical toilets, showers, laundry...

title: (36789) La Guardia - 51 PO-552
description:
Revolution self-service laundry next to the supermarket. Plenty of parking for all sizes of motorhomes.
Right next to it there is an Eroski center and at the entrance there are some lockers with plugs where you can charge your mobile or similar for free.

title: (36770) Portecelo - 2 Lugar Portecelo
description: Freshly created small park around the pilgrims' café at a viewpoint. The old gravel car park no longer exists. There are five wide parking spaces, large enough for motorhomes, but sloping. Illuminated at night, close to residential houses. A peaceful place at night, during the day there're certainly many pilgrims on the Camino. Excellent sea view and playground for children.

title: (36789) A Guarda -
description: Quiet area at the beginning of the mountain, forest house, there is a fountain without a tap and some stone tables

title: (4940) Caminho do Agrelo - N303
description: Car park of beautiful river beach, with nice shade and beautiful surroundings! Close to picnick area and small bar and restaurant. Public toilets available. At night it was a bit noisy and dark which unfortunatly made our night less peaceful!

title: (36307) Bayona - EP-2202
description: Picnic with tables, fountain, and stunning views. Some slope. Near the access to the pools of Mougas

title: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
title_short: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
description: Former asphalt sports field in the middle of nature. The new park is just below. Beautiful view with stream, pick nick table and barbecue a few meters away. A few houses scattered around.

title: (36729) Os Baños - 37 Rúa Baños
description: At the end of a small road, we spent a single, hassle-free night near the Mino River.

title: () Oia - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area just before the Pozas de Mougas. Area with stone tables, barbecues and many trees to eat and park. Unpaved road in not very good condition. In the area of the picnic area you can park, straight and in the shade, a single space, several spaces on the slightly inclined track without shade. We spent the night there, after spending all day in the pools, a wonder where you don't run into anyone, suitable for a small vehicle and with good tires!

title: (4910) Caminha - Avenida Doctor Dantas Carneiro
description: Ferry Portugal Spain Caminha. night and day parking ok.

title: (36780) A Guarda - 21 Rúa A Coruña
description: Parking day and night, on Saturday from 8:00 to 15:00 clock prohibited because of the weekly market.

title: (4910-105) Caminha - 36 Avenida Padre Pinheiro
description: Nice and quiet parking lots, for small motorhomes.

title: (4940) - EM1076
description: Place only for a van, on a bend, safe, near a church. We spent a night in absolute calm! The only small constraint: the church bells ring until 10 p.m. and do not start again in the morning until 7 a.m.! Otherwise the place is peaceful, some inhabitants of the hamlet walked by in the evening and kindly greeted us! Perfect for one night!

title: (36789) A Guarda - 175 Carretera Baiona - A Guarda
title_short: (36789) A Guarda - 175 Carretera Baiona - A Guarda
description: Petronor Service Filling and Draining Station. They have to sell products for CC. 2 km from La Guardia and close to beaches. They speak French.

title: (36788) A Pasaxe - 56 Urbanizacion Rio Miño B
title_short: (36788) A Pasaxe - 56 Urbanizacion Rio Miño B
description: Many free parking spaces, easy to access. Quiet night in front of Workout sports area. Very beautiful view of the estuary and the Portuguese coast (due east). Children's play area. Sorting bins. Access to the pier for a crossing to Porto possible.

title: (36789) A Guarda -
description: Magnificent spot a bit of a slope to park but with an incredible view some stone tables to eat.

title: (4910-164) Caminha - 31 Rua Barão de São Roque
title_short: (4910-164) Caminha - 31 Rua Barão de São Roque
description: We have parked and slept very well. After 8:00 p.m. we were alone, with views of the miño !!

title: (36789) A Guarda - 88 Rúa Baixada á Praia
title_short: (36789) A Guarda - 88 Rúa Baixada á Praia
description: Place of picnic very easy access outside the city and at the edge of the rocks.

title: (36780) A Guarda - 22 Rúa Galicia
description: Laundry on the main street, local washing and drying of automatic opening and closing, it has a change machine.

title: (36789) La Guardia - 2-15 Carretera Baiona - A Guarda
title_short: (36789) La Guardia - 2-15 Carretera Baiona - A Guarda
description: Quiet place to spend the night by the sea, in an old cetarea (historic lobster nursery) and the Camino de Santiago along the coast.

title: (36789) A Guarda - Avenida Brasil
description:
Good place to spend the night
 Very calm. We sleep alone. Spectacular sunset, there are no services but to spend the night and a few days at the beach, incredible.

title: (36721) Os Baños - 74 Rúa Baños
description: Next to the river Miño in Caldelas. In summer there is a chiringuito open and at the end of August there are very popular festivals and it gets full of people. you have to be careful in winter with the rises in the river flow. beautiful views and possibility of routes and bathing

title: (36380) Gondomar - 31 Rúa Eduardo Iglesias
description: Free, spacious land parking, without services and without the possibility of staying overnight. It is close to the town and is ideal to leave the AC to take a walk in the area.

title: (36789) A Guarda - 33 Rua Bajada a la Playa
title_short: (36789) A Guarda - 33 Rua Bajada a la Playa
description: Quiet and safe parking at the edge of the sea on a small beach. With wonderful sunsets. Very close to the urban center and port of A Guarda. Itinerary of the Camino de Santiago. Close taperia with terrace where you eat very well and cheap.

title: (36789) A Guarda -
description: In the Camino de Santiago. stuck to the shore. Flat parking area and we have spent the night in August alone. Calm. In the morning all the pilgrims on the way pass by.

title: (4910-136) Caminha - 0 Largo da Feira
description: Flat free public P in front of the mouth of the Miño river. NOTE: it happens here week open market each Wednesday early morning. Aside N 13 main road, so it is not fully quiet by night. Easy access. Very near historic center.

title: (4940-527) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
title_short: (4940-527) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Motorhome service area. Really nice. Very large with all services including electricity.

title: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Doutor Aquilino Ribeiro
title_short: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Doutor Aquilino Ribeiro
